price: (Rántí) Ọjọ́ tí ẹ̀mí kọ̀ọ̀kan yóò dé tí yóò máa rojọ́ gbe ara rẹ̀. A ó sì san ẹ̀mí kọ̀ọ̀kan ní ẹ̀san ohun tí ó ṣe níṣẹ́; wọn kò sì níí ṣàbòsí sí wọn.
arabic: ۞ يَوۡمَ تَأۡتِي كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ تُجَٰدِلُ عَن نَّفۡسِهَا وَتُوَفَّىٰ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّا عَمِلَتۡ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yawma tatī kullu nafsin tujādilu ʿan nafsihā watuwaffā kullu nafsin mā ʿamilat wahum lā yuẓ'lamūna
translations: and will be paid in full
